task_definition_name: Better The User Interface Design For Product Details Page Of Mifos X Web App .
description:
Due to it's tabular display, the current Product Details page ( Loan, Savings, Share , FD , RD ) is often hard to identify and read the data by matching it to the respective column as there are a lot of entries. For this task, you are supposed to design a better UI by submitting a mockup/wireframe for the same in this folder ( https://goo.gl/TrTMi3 ).

You can test the current User Interface in https://staging.openmf.org/ with username: mifos and password : password. 

Navigate to Admin>>Products>>Loan Product.
